mapper.sql: id as id, expert_id as expertId, user_id as userId, user_name as userName, server_type as serverType, user_comments as userComments, is_checked as isChecked, create_date as createDate
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_expert_appraise ( expert_id, user_id, user_name, server_type, user_comments, is_checked, create_date ) VALUES ( #{expertId}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{serverType}, #{userComments}, #{isChecked}, #{createDate} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_expert_appraise
expert_id = #{expertId},
user_id = #{userId},
user_name = #{userName},
server_type = #{serverType},
user_comments = #{userComments},
is_checked = #{isChecked},
create_date = #{createDate},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_expert_appraise
expert_id = #{map.expertId},
user_id = #{map.userId},
user_name = #{map.userName},
server_type = #{map.serverType},
user_comments = #{map.userComments},
is_checked = #{map.isChecked},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_expert_appraise ( expert_id, user_id, user_name, server_type, user_comments, is_checked, create_date ) VALUES ( #{map.expertId}, #{map.userId}, #{map.userName}, #{map.serverType}, #{map.userComments}, #{map.isChecked}, #{map.appDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_expert_appraise
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND expert_id like CONCAT('%', #{expertId} , '%')
AND user_id like CONCAT('%', #{userId} , '%')
AND user_name like CONCAT('%', #{userName} , '%')
AND server_type like CONCAT('%', #{serverType} , '%')
AND user_comments like CONCAT('%', #{userComments} , '%')
AND is_checked like CONCAT('%', #{isChecked} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
